Home.description: Welcome to my website, I am a systems engineer with extensive experience in software development with a senior level, I hope we can build projects together.

About.description: Systems engineer with extensive experience in software development, I like to explore and learn about new technologies and development techniques, with good leadership and curiosity that has led me to be a great self-taught person. Nature lover and hoping to contribute to a better world.
